London.name: Soho
London.description: Entertainment district with theaters, jazz clubs, Chinatown, and vibrant LGBTQ+ scene

London.name: Shoreditch
London.description: Trendy East End area with street art, tech startups, vintage markets, and rooftop bars

London.name: Covent Garden
London.description: Historic market area with street performers, opera house, and Piazza shopping arcade

London.name: Camden
London.description: Alternative neighborhood with famous market, music venues, and punk heritage

London.name: Notting Hill
London.description: Colorful Victorian townhouses, Portobello Road Market, and the annual carnival

London.name: South Bank
London.description: Riverside cultural hub with Tate Modern, National Theatre, and street food markets

London.name: Westminster
London.description: Political heart with Big Ben, Houses of Parliament, Westminster Abbey, and Buckingham Palace

London.name: Kensington
London.description: Museum district with V&A, Natural History Museum, and upscale shopping

London.name: Greenwich
London.description: Maritime heritage area with Royal Observatory, Cutty Sark, and Meridian Line

London.name: Brixton
London.description: Multicultural neighborhood with Electric Avenue market, Caribbean food, and live music venues

London.name: Chelsea
London.description: Affluent area with King's Road boutiques, Saatchi Gallery, and riverside walks

London.name: Hampstead
London.description: Village atmosphere with Heath parkland, Fenton House, and literary history

Edinburgh.name: Old Town
Edinburgh.description: Medieval core with Royal Mile, Edinburgh Castle, and underground vaults

Edinburgh.name: New Town
Edinburgh.description: Georgian elegance with neoclassical architecture, Princes Street shops, and gardens

Edinburgh.name: Stockbridge
Edinburgh.description: Bohemian neighborhood with artisan shops, Sunday market, and Water of Leith walkway

Edinburgh.name: Leith
Edinburgh.description: Port district with waterfront dining, Royal Yacht Britannia, and vibrant nightlife

Edinburgh.name: Bruntsfield
Edinburgh.description: Trendy area with independent cafes, boutique shops, and Meadows park access

Manchester.name: Northern Quarter
Manchester.description: Creative hub with independent bars, vintage shops, street art, and music venues

Manchester.name: Ancoats
Manchester.description: Former industrial area reborn with artisan coffee, craft breweries, and canal-side living

Manchester.name: Castlefield
Manchester.description: Urban heritage park with Roman fort, canal basins, and outdoor events

Manchester.name: Chorlton
Manchester.description: Leafy suburb with vegan cafes, independent shops, and a relaxed bohemian vibe

Manchester.name: Deansgate
Manchester.description: Central thoroughfare with Beetham Tower, shops, and Spinningfields business district

Bristol.name: Clifton
Bristol.description: Georgian architecture with suspension bridge views, village shops, and balloon fiesta

Bristol.name: Stokes Croft
Bristol.description: Street art capital with Banksy works, independent shops, and alternative culture

Bristol.name: Harbourside
Bristol.description: Waterfront area with SS Great Britain, museums, and modern apartment developments

Bristol.name: Southville
Bristol.description: Trendy neighborhood with independent cinema, community gardens, and North Street vibe

Bristol.name: Redland
Bristol.description: Affluent residential area with Victorian villas, cafes, and green spaces
